entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Platform-specific properties for Drag and Drop Gesture Recognizer EventArgs #16992
  • Templated FlyoutItem isn't displaying after visibility is toggled back on #16991
    Backlog
  • ClearButton Not Functioning in Android Platform with Margin Property in .NET MAUI #16980
    Backlog
  • Dropping files into CollectionView not working on Mac Catalyst #16979
    Backlog
  • PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #16978
  • (App Name).build.appxrecipe" does not exist. You may need to build your project #16975
  • [MAUI] RefreshView C7 Pull down in the purple view isn't activate the RefreshView on Surface. #16974
  • [MAUI] RefreshView C4 RefreshColor is not displayed correctly on Surface when refreshing. #16973
  • CharacterSpacing is not working on iOS after clearing textbox #16971
    Backlog
  • Windows application frame #16969

Closed

  • DisplayAlert Displaying Beneath PopupPage (Mopups) on iOS #16321
    .NET 8 GA
  • Flyout is not refreshing when item visibility is changed #10468
    Backlog
  • Label InputTransparent property in MAUI XAML is being ignored in windows only. #16831
    Backlog
  • How to remove the radius at the edges in Shell Flyout in MAUI #16832
  • Loaded and Unloaded events are not fired correctly #13245
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] iOS: Shell navigation crashes the app with SIGSEGV #16860
    .NET 8 GA
  • Label that HorizontalOptions is "EndAndExpand" in HorizontalStackLayout are not working #16972
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Bug: Android & iOS - Binding inside of DataTemplate not working if swipeView is present #16855
  • Incorrect sample code on https://github.com/dotnet/maui/wiki/Xamarin.Forms----MAUI.Controls-Layout-Differences #16984
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [WinUI] CollectionView throws an exception after adding a second item #16320
    .NET 8 GA
  • SetSite failed for package [Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.Implementation.EditorPackage]Source #16775
  • Black splash screen on iOS device and simulator #16945
  • Random empty rows on ListView #16669
    Backlog
  • Unable to create a maui (v7) app on windows and target iOS #16915
  • InputTransparent logic/intended behavior #7489
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Shell.TitleView still doesn't work in iPhone even with 7.0.92 #16707
  • PhoneDialer not working in Windows #16788
  • MAUI WebView does not execute JS chart lib function on Mac #14394
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [workload] Move default item updates to workload sdk #16990
  • [android] fix DI registration for Frame, ListView, TableView #16989
  • Add a template for multi-head maui apps #16988
  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView

Merged

  • Present to UIWindow associated with passed in page #16983
  • Fix so updating FlyoutItemIsVisible hides/shows shell menu item #16942
    area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Bring latest changes from main #16976
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8.0.0-rc.1.23419.3 #16963
  • Revert "Remove TargetIdiom" #16982
  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868
    .NET 8 GA
  • Revert adding Windows DeviceTests to .NET 7 #16970
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [WinUI] Fix exception when adding items to a linear layout CollectionView #16958
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16968
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform
  • [android] Fixed ListView visibility and opacity on Android #16941
    area/ListView
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨
  • Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨
  • Fix #16470 - [Android] Improvements to TabbedPage API #16965
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • Use a fixed WinUI window size for Appium test app #16956
    area/testing
  • Add .NET Foundation license file header #16896
    area/architecture, Under Consideration
  • Windows CollectionView TapGesture from keyboard #16952
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16692
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, Under Consideration
